Given that you're interested in a psychological thriller, I'd highly recommend "Wolf Creek". This film revolves around three backpackers who encounter a terrifying local on an outback trip and live through a nightmare of unimaginable terror. Although it might not match the Hitchcockian style of "Psycho", its suspenseful atmosphere is definitely captivating!

If you're more into humor with a dark twist, then "Horrible Bosses" could be the movie for you. It features three friends conspiring to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness. It's a hilarious take on workplace drama!
